12877340Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] test = { 49, 50, 51 };Di2015NewLine if (data == null || data.Length == 0) return CRC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uint eax = CRC, ebx = 0, ecx = (uint)data.Length, edx = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Start:Di2015NewLine Table[ebx];Di2015NewLine        edx++;Di2015NewLine        ecx--;Di2015NewLine        if (ecx != 0) goto Start;Di2015NewLine        return eax;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static 12878386Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void targetContainer_PointerMoved(object sender, PointerRoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint currentPoint = e.GetCurrentPoint(targetContainer);Di2015NewLine    if (currentPoint.IsInContact)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (startLocation.ContainsKey(currentPoint.PointerId))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point startPoint = startLocation[currentPoint.PointerId];Di2015NewLine            if (Math.Abs(currentPoint.Position.X - startPoint.X) > swipeThresholdX) // I only did one Axis for testingDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pointSwiped[currentPoint.PointerId] = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    updateInfoPop(e);Di2015NewLine}               Di2015NewLine
12878386Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing PointerInputDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// An empty page that can be used on its own or navigated to within a Frame.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public sealed partial class MainPage : PageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Windows.Devices.Input.TouchCapabilities SupportedContacts = new Windows.Devices.Input.TouchCapabilities();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uint numActiveContacts;Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<uint, Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint> contacts;Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<uint, Point> startLocation;Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<uint, bool> pointSwiped;Di2015NewLine        int swipeThresholdX = 100;Di2015NewLine        int swipeThresholdY = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MainPage()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine            numActiveContacts = 0;Di2015NewLine            contacts = new Dictionary<uint, Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint>((int)SupportedContacts.Contacts);Di2015NewLine            startLocation = new Dictionary<uint, Point>((int)SupportedContacts.Contacts);Di2015NewLine            pointSwiped = new Dictionary<uint, bool>((int)SupportedContacts.Contacts);Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.PointerPressed += new PointerEventHandler(targetContainer_PointerPressed);Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.PointerEntered += new PointerEventHandler(targetContainer_PointerEntered);Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.PointerReleased += new PointerEventHandler(targetContainer_PointerReleased);Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.PointerExited += new PointerEventHandler(targetContainer_PointerExited);Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.PointerCanceled += new PointerEventHandler(targetContainer_PointerCanceled);Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.PointerCaptureLost += new PointerEventHandler(targetContainer_PointerCaptureLost);Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.PointerMoved += new PointerEventHandler(targetContainer_PointerMoved);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // PointerPressed and PointerReleased events do not always occur in pairs. Di2015NewLine        // Your app should listen for and handle any event that might conclude a pointer down action Di2015NewLine        // (such as PointerExited, PointerCanceled, and PointerCaptureLost).Di2015NewLine        void targetContainer_PointerPressed(object sender, PointerRoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Convert.ToBoolean(SupportedContacts.TouchPresent) && (numActiveContacts > SupportedContacts.Contacts))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // cannot support more contactsDi2015NewLine                eventLog.Text += "\\nNumber of contacts exceeds the number supported by the device.";Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint pt = e.GetCurrentPoint(targetContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update event sequence.Di2015NewLine            eventLog.Text += "\\nDown: " + pt.PointerId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Change background color of target when pointer contact detected.Di2015NewLine            targetContainer.Fill = new SolidColorBrush(Windows.UI.Colors.Green);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if pointer already exists (if enter occurred prior to down).Di2015NewLine            if (contacts.ContainsKey(pt.PointerId))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            contacts[pt.PointerId] = pt;Di2015NewLine            startLocation[pt.PointerId] = pt.Position;Di2015NewLine            pointSwiped[pt.PointerId] = false;Di2015NewLine            ++numActiveContacts;Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Display pointer details.Di2015NewLine            createInfoPop(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void targetContainer_PointerEntered(object sender, PointerRoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint pt = e.GetCurrentPoint(targetContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update event sequence.Di2015NewLine            eventLog.Text += "\\nOver: " + pt.PointerId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (contacts.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Change background color of target when pointer contact detected.Di2015NewLine                targetContainer.Fill = new SolidColorBrush(Windows.UI.Colors.Blue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if pointer already exists (if enter occurred prior to down).Di2015NewLine            if (contacts.ContainsKey(pt.PointerId))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Push new pointer Id onto expando target pointers array.Di2015NewLine            contacts[pt.PointerId] = pt;Di2015NewLine            startLocation[pt.PointerId] = pt.Position;Di2015NewLine            pointSwiped[pt.PointerId] = false;Di2015NewLine            ++numActiveContacts;Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Display pointer details.Di2015NewLine            createInfoPop(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Fires for for various reasons, including: Di2015NewLine        //    - User interactionsDi2015NewLine        //    - Programmatic caputre of another pointerDi2015NewLine        //    - Captured pointer was deliberately releasedDi2015NewLine        // PointerCaptureLost can fire instead of PointerReleased. Di2015NewLine        private void targetContainer_PointerCaptureLost(object sender, PointerRoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint pt = e.GetCurrentPoint(targetContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update event sequence.Di2015NewLine            eventLog.Text += "\\nPointer capture lost: " + pt.PointerId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (contacts.ContainsKey(pt.PointerId))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                checkSwipe();Di2015NewLine                contacts[pt.PointerId] = null;Di2015NewLine                contacts.Remove(pt.PointerId);Di2015NewLine                startLocation.Remove(pt.PointerId);Di2015NewLine                if (pointSwiped.ContainsKey(pt.PointerId))Di2015NewLine                    pointSwiped.Remove(pt.PointerId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                --numActiveContacts;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update the UI and pointer details.Di2015NewLine            foreach (TextBlock tb in pointerInfo.Children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (tb.Name == e.Pointer.PointerId.ToString())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pointerInfo.Children.Remove(tb);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (contacts.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                targetContainer.Fill = new SolidColorBrush(Windows.UI.Colors.Black);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Fires for for various reasons, including: Di2015NewLine        //    - A touch contact is canceled by a pen coming into range of the surface.Di2015NewLine        //    - The device doesn't report an active contact for more than 100ms.Di2015NewLine        //    - The desktop is locked or the user logged off. Di2015NewLine        //    - The number of simultaneous contacts exceeded the number supported by the device.Di2015NewLine        private void targetContainer_PointerCanceled(object sender, PointerRoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint pt = e.GetCurrentPoint(targetContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update event pointerInfo.Children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (tb.Name == e.Pointer.PointerId.ToString())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void targetContainer_PointerMoved(object sender, PointerRoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint           {Di2015NewLine                case Windows.Devices.Input.PointerDeviceType.Mouse:Di2015NewLine                    details += "\\nPointer type: mouse";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Windows.Devices.Input.PointerDeviceType.Pen:Di2015NewLine                    details += "\\nPointer type: pen";Di2015NewLine                    if (e.Pointer.IsInContact)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        details += "\\nPressure: " + currentPoint.Properties.Pressure;Di2015NewLine                        details += "\\nrotation: " + currentPoint.Properties.Orientation;Di2015NewLine                        details += "\\nTilt X: " + currentPoint.Properties.XTilt;Di2015NewLine                        details += "\\nTilt Y: " + currentPoint.Properties.YTilt;Di2015NewLine                        details += "\\nBarrel button pressed: " + currentPoint.Properties.IsBarrelButtonPressed;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Windows.Devices.Input.PointerDeviceType.Touch:Di2015NewLine                    details += "\\nPointer type: touch";Di2015NewLine                    details += "\\nrotation: " + currentPoint.Properties.Orientation;Di2015NewLine                    details += "\\nTilt X: " + currentPoint.Properties.XTilt;Di2015NewLine                    details += "\\nTilt Y: " + currentPoint.Properties.YTilt;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    details += "\\nPointer type: n/a";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GeneralTransform gt = targetContainer.TransformToVisual(page);Di2015NewLine            Point screenPoint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            screenPoint = gt.TransformPoint(new Point(currentPoint.Position.X, currentPoint.Position.Y));Di2015NewLine            details += "\\nPointer Id: " + currentPoint.PointerId.ToString() +Di2015NewLine                "\\nPointer location (parent): " + currentPoint.Position.X + ", " + currentPoint.Position.Y +Di2015NewLine                "\\nPointer location (screen): " + screenPoint.X + ", " + screenPoint.Y;Di2015NewLine            return details;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12879501Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int FindClosest(int given_number, int[] list_of_integers) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start min_delta with first element because it's saferDi2015NewLine    int min_index = 0;Di2015NewLine    int min_delta = list_of_integers[0] - given_number;Di2015NewLine    // Take absolute value of the min_deltaDi2015NewLine    if ( min_delta < 0 ) {Di2015NewLine        min_delta = min_delta * ( -1 );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Iterate through the list of integers to find the minimal deltaDi2015NewLine    // Skip first element because min_delta is set with first element'sDi2015NewLine    for ( int index = 1; index < list_of_integers.size(); index++ ) {Di2015NewLine        cur_delta = list_of_integers[index] - given_number;Di2015NewLine        // Take absolute value of the current deltaDi2015NewLine        if ( cur_delta < 0 ) {Di2015NewLine            cur_delta = cur_delta * ( -1 );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Update the minimum delta and save the indexDi2015NewLine        if ( cur_delta < min_delta ) {Di2015NewLine            min_delta = cur_delta;Di2015NewLine            min_index = cur_index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return list_of_integers[min_index];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12880376Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisualTreeHelper
12880376Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T FindChild<T>(DependencyObject parent, string childName)Di2015NewLine           where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // Confirm parent is valid.  Di2015NewLine   if (parent == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   T foundChild = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   int childrenCount = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine   for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i);Di2015NewLine      // If the child is not of the request child type child Di2015NewLine      T childType = child as T;Di2015NewLine      if (childType == null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          // recursively drill down the tree Di2015NewLine          foundChild = FindChild<T>(child, childName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // If the child is found, break so we do not overwrite the found child.  Di2015NewLine          if (foundChild != null) break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      else if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(childName))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          var frameworkElement = child as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine          // If the child's name is set for search Di2015NewLine          if (frameworkElement != null && frameworkElement.Name == childName)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             // if the child's name is of the request name Di2015NewLine             foundChild = (T)child;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          // child element found. Di2015NewLine          foundChild = (T)child;Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return foundChild;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12880376Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (int i = 0; i < grd.Items.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   DataGridRow row = (DataGridRow)grd.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(i);Di2015NewLine   CheckBox checkBox = FindChild<CheckBox>(row, "chb");Di2015NewLine   if( checkBox != null && checkBox.IsChecked == true )Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       //some codeDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12881529Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Executes the specified action. If the action results in a file sharing violation exception, the action will beDi2015NewLine/// repeatedly retried after a short delay (which increases after every failed attempt).Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="action">The action to be attempted and possibly retried.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="maximum">Maximum amount of time to keep retrying for. When expired, any sharing violationDi2015NewLine/// exception will propagate to the caller of this method. Use null to retry indefinitely.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="onSharingVio">Action to execute when a sharing violation does occur (is called before the waiting).</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void WaitSharingVio(Action action, TimeSpan? maximum = null, Action onSharingVio = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    WaitSharingVio<bool>(() => { action(); return true; }, maximum, onSharingVio);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Executes the specified function. If the function results in a file sharing violation exception, the function will beDi2015NewLine/// repeatedly retried after a short delay (which increases after every failed attempt).Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="func">The function to be attempted and possibly retried.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="maximum">Maximum amount of time to keep retrying for. When expired, any sharing violationDi2015NewLine/// exception will propagate to the caller of this method. Use null to retry indefinitely.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="onSharingVio">Action to execute when a sharing violation does occur (is called before the waiting).</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static T WaitSharingVio<T>(Func<T> func, TimeSpan? maximum = null, Action onSharingVio = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var started = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine    int sleep = 279;Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return func();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (IOException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int hResult = 0;Di2015NewLine            try { hResult = (int) ex.GetType().GetProperty("HResult", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance).GetValue(ex, null); }Di2015NewLine            catch { }Di2015NewLine            if (hResult != -2147024864) // 0x80070020 ERROR_SHARING_VIOLATIONDi2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            if (onSharingVio != null)Di2015NewLine                onSharingVio();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (maximum != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int leftMs = (int) (maximum.Value - (DateTime.UtcNow - started)).TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine            if (sleep > leftMs)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(leftMs);Di2015NewLine                return func(); // or throw the sharing vio exceptionDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(sleep);Di2015NewLine        sleep = Math.Min((sleep * 3) >> 1, 10000);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Trying again soon...");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine);Di2015NewLine

12884649Di2015UniqueSeparator    class TeamsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int[] A_Side;Di2015NewLine    private int[] B_Side;Di2015NewLine    public int[,] PlayingCounter;Di2015NewLine    public int RoundCounter = 1;Di2015NewLine    public bool DummyTeam = false;                 // ODD number of teams -> one team will no be able to play.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool NextRoundExistsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (RoundCounter < B_Side.Length-1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Teams(int NumberOfTeams)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (NumberOfTeams % 2 != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            NumberOfTeams++; DummyTeam = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        A_Side = new int[NumberOfTeams];Di2015NewLine        B_Side = new int[NumberOfTeams];Di2015NewLine        PlayingCounter = new int[NumberOfTeams,NumberOfTeams];     // Counting to see if alg is correctDi2015NewLine        int x,y;Di2015NewLine        for (x=0; x<NumberOfTeams; x++) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            A_Side[x] = x + 1;                  Di2015NewLine            B_Side[NumberOfTeams-x-1]=x+1; Di2015NewLine            for (y=0;y<NumberOfTeams;y++) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PlayingCounter[x,y] = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void rotate_A_Side(int AtPos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (AtPos == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int iO = A_Side[A_Side.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine            rotate_A_Side(AtPos+1);Di2015NewLine            A_Side[1] = iO;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (AtPos < A_Side.Length - 1) { rotate_A_Side(AtPos + 1); }Di2015NewLine            A_Side[AtPos] = A_Side[AtPos - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void rotate_B_Side()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLine        for (i = 0; i<B_Side.Length/2 ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            B_Side[i] = B_Side[i + 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (i = B_Side.Length / 2; i < B_Side.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            B_Side[i] = A_Side[B_Side.Length/2 - (i -B_Side.Length/2 + 1) ];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool NextRound()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (NextRoundExists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RoundCounter++;         // Next roundDi2015NewLine            rotate_A_Side(1);       // A side rotationDi2015NewLine            rotate_B_Side();        // B side rotationDi2015NewLine            LogRound();             // Update countersDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void LogRound()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < A_Side.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PlayingCounter[A_Side[x]-1, B_Side[x]-1]++;Di2015NewLine            PlayingCounter[B_Side[x]-1, A_Side[x]-1]++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string GetCounters()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string return_value = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < A_Side.Length; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < A_Side.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return_value += String.Format(" {0:D3}", PlayingCounter[y, x]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return_value += System.Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return return_value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetCurrentRound()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string Round = "Round #" + RoundCounter.ToString() + " ";Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < B_Side.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Round += String.Format("Team {0} - Team {1};", A_Side[x], B_Side[x]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Round;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12886260Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression
12886260Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Task<T> TaskFromEventHelper<T>(object target, string eventName, Delegate resultSetter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tcs             = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLine    var addMethod       = target.GetType().GetEvent(eventName).GetAddMethod();Di2015NewLine    var delegateType    = addMethod.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine    var methodInfo      = delegateType.GetMethod("Invoke");Di2015NewLine    var parameters      = methodInfo.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine                                    .Select(a => Expression.Parameter(a.ParameterType))Di2015NewLine                                    .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // building method, which argument count andDi2015NewLine    // their types are not known at compile timeDi2015NewLine    var exp = // (%arguments%) => tcs.SetResult(resultSetter.Invoke(%arguments%))Di2015NewLine        Expression.Lambda(Di2015NewLine            delegateType,Di2015NewLine            Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant(tcs),Di2015NewLine                tcs.GetType().GetMethod("SetResult"),Di2015NewLine                Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Constant(resultSetter),Di2015NewLine                    resultSetter.GetType().GetMethod("Invoke"),Di2015NewLine                    parameters)),Di2015NewLine            parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    addMethod.Invoke(target, new object[] { exp.Compile() });Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

The sum of these multiples is 23.Di2015NewLine        //Find the sum of all the multiples of 3 or 5 below 1000.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int multiplierA = 3;Di2015NewLine        int multiplierB = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int maxNum = 1000;Di2015NewLine        int i = 1;Di2015NewLine        int result = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<int> deelEen = MultiplyFactory(multiplierA, i, maxNum);Di2015NewLine        List<int> deelTwee = MultiplyFactory(multiplierB, i, maxNum);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (int val in deelEen)Di2015NewLine            result += val;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (int val in deelTwee)Di2015NewLine            if (!deelEen.Contains(val)) result += val;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static List<int> MultiplyFactory(int multiplier, int i, int maxNum)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<int> savedNumbers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        while (multiplier * i < maxNum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            savedNumbers.Add(multiplier * i);Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return savedNumbers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12892685Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Calculates the end-point from a given source at a given range (meters) and bearing (degrees).Di2015NewLine    /// This methods uses simple geometry equations to calculate the end-point.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">Point of origin</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="range">Range in meters</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bearing">Bearing in degrees</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>End-point from the source given the desired range and bearing.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static PointLatLng CalculateDerivedPosition(PointLatLng source, double range, double bearing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double latA = source.Lat * DEGREES_TO_RADIANS;Di2015NewLine        double lonA = source.Lng * DEGREES_TO_RADIANS;Di2015NewLine        double angularDistance = range / EARTH_RADIUS_M;Di2015NewLine        double trueCourse = bearing * DEGREES_TO_RADIANS;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double lat = Math.Asin(Di2015NewLine            Math.Sin(latA) * Math.Cos(angularDistance) +Di2015NewLine            Math.Cos(latA) * Math.Sin(angularDistance) * Math.Cos(trueCourse));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double dlon = Math.Atan2(Di2015NewLine            Math.Sin(trueCourse) * Math.Sin(angularDistance) * Math.Cos(latA),Di2015NewLine            Math.Cos(angularDistance) - Math.Sin(latA) * Math.Sin(lat));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double lon = ((lonA + dlon + Math.PI) % (Math.PI * 2)) - Math.PI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new PointLatLng(Di2015NewLine            lat / DEGREES_TO_RADIANS,Di2015NewLine            lon / DEGREES_TO_RADIANS);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12899358Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Image resizeImage(Image imgToResize, Size size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int sourceWidth = imgToResize.Width;Di2015NewLine   int sourceHeight = imgToResize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   float nPercent = 0;Di2015NewLine   float nPercentW = 0;Di2015NewLine   float nPercentH = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   nPercentW = ((float)size.Width / (float)sourceWidth);Di2015NewLine   nPercentH = ((float)size.Height / (float)sourceHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (nPercentH < nPercentW)Di2015NewLine      nPercent = nPercentH;Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine      nPercent = nPercentW;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   int destWidth = (int)(sourceWidth * nPercent);Di2015NewLine   int destHeight = (int)(sourceHeight * nPercent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Bitmap b = new Bitmap(destWidth, destHeight);Di2015NewLine   Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage((Image)b);Di2015NewLine   g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   g.DrawImage(imgToResize, 0, 0, destWidth, destHeight);Di2015NewLine   g.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return (Image)b;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

12899714Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class XMLtoDataTable {Di2015NewLine  private static ColumnType getDefaultType() {Di2015NewLine    return new ColumnType(typeof(String));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        struct ColumnType {Di2015NewLine            public Type type;Di2015NewLine            private string name;Di2015NewLine            public ColumnType(Type type) { this.type = type; this.name = type.ToString().ToLower(); }Di2015NewLine            public object ParseString(string input) {Di2015NewLine                if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(input))Di2015NewLine                    return DBNull.Value;Di2015NewLine                switch (type.ToString()) {Di2015NewLine                    case "system.datetime":Di2015NewLine                        return DateTime.Parse(input);Di2015NewLine                    case "system.decimal":Di2015NewLine                        return decimal.Parse(input);Di2015NewLine                    case "system.boolean":Di2015NewLine                        return bool.Parse(input);Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        return input;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ColumnType getType(XmlNode data) {Di2015NewLine    string type = null;Di2015NewLine    if (data.Attributes["ss:Type"] == null || data.Attributes["ss:Type"].Value == null)Di2015NewLine        type = "";Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        type = data.Attributes["ss:Type"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (type) {Di2015NewLine        case "DateTime":Di2015NewLine            return new ColumnType(typeof(DateTime));Di2015NewLine        case "Boolean":Di2015NewLine            return new ColumnType(typeof(Boolean));Di2015NewLine        case "Number":Di2015NewLine            return new ColumnType(typeof(Decimal));Di2015NewLine        case "":Di2015NewLine            decimal test2;Di2015NewLine            if (data == null || String.IsNullOrEmpty(data.InnerText) || decimal.TryParse(data.InnerText, out test2)) {Di2015NewLine                return new ColumnType(typeof(Decimal));Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                return new ColumnType(typeof(String));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        default://"String"Di2015NewLine            return new ColumnType(typeof(String));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static DataSet ImportExcelXML (string fileName, bool hasHeaders, bool autoDetectColumnType) {Di2015NewLine        StreamReader sr = new doc.DocumentElement.SelectNodes("//ss:Worksheet", nsmgr)) {Di2015NewLine            DataTable dt = new DataTable(node.Attributes["ss:Name"].Value);Di2015NewLine autoDetectType.type);Di2015NewLine                            columns.Add(autoDetectType);Di2015NewLine                        } else {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        actualCellIndex++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine 12899943Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public enum PasswordScoreDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Blank = 0,Di2015NewLine    VeryWeak = 1,Di2015NewLine    Weak = 2,Di2015NewLine    Medium = 3,Di2015NewLine    Strong = 4,Di2015NewLine    VeryStrong = 5Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public class PasswordAdvisorDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public static PasswordScore CheckStrength(string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      int score = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (password.Length < 1)Di2015NewLine        return PasswordScore.Blank;Di2015NewLine      if (password.Length < 4)Di2015NewLine        return PasswordScore.VeryWeak;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (password.Length >= 8)Di2015NewLine        score++;Di2015NewLine      if (password.Length >= 12)Di2015NewLine        score++;Di2015NewLine      if (Regex.Match(password, @"/\\d+/", RegexOptions.ECMAScript).Success)Di2015NewLine        score++;Di2015NewLine      if (Regex.Match(password, @"/[a-z]/", RegexOptions.ECMAScript).Success &&Di2015NewLine        Regex.Match(password, @"/[A-Z]/", RegexOptions.ECMAScript).Success)Di2015NewLine        score++;Di2015NewLine      if (Regex.Match(password, @"/.[!,@,#,$,%,^,&,*,?,_,~,-,,(,)]/", RegexOptions.ECMAScript).Success)Di2015NewLine        score++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return (PasswordScore)score;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine
12899943Di2015UniqueSeparatorString password = "MyDummy_Password"; // Substitute with the user input stringDi2015NewLinePasswordScore passwordStrengthScore = PasswordAdvisor.CheckStrength(password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineswitch (passwordStrengthScore) {Di2015NewLine    case PasswordScore.Blank:Di2015NewLine    case PasswordScore.VeryWeak:Di2015NewLine    case PasswordScore.Weak:Di2015NewLine            // Show an error message to the userDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    case PasswordScore.Medium:Di2015NewLine    case PasswordScore.Strong:Di2015NewLine    case PasswordScore.VeryStrong:Di2015NewLine           // Password deemed strong enough, allow user to be added to database etcDi2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatorint evenNumbers = 0;Di2015NewLineint minInt = Int32.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineint maxInt = Int32.MinValue;Di2015NewLineint range;Di2015NewLinestring result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGenerateNumbers(ref evenNumbers, ref minInt, ref maxInt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinerange = maxInt - minInt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineresult = "Even numbers:\\t" + evenNumbers;Di2015NewLineresult += "\\nMin number:\\t" + minInt;Di2015NewLineresult += "\\nMax number:\\t" + maxInt;Di2015NewLineresult += "\\nRange of number:\\t" + maxInt + " - " + minInt + " = " + range;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDisplayResults(result);Di2015NewLine
12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatorGenerateNumbers
12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void GenerateNumbers(ref int evenNumbers,  ref int minInt,  ref int maxInt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //creating 100 element arrayDi2015NewLine    //and using the random function to fill itDi2015NewLine    int[] randomNumbers = new int[100];Di2015NewLine    Random number = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int randy;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < randomNumbers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        randy = number.Next(1000);Di2015NewLine        randomNumbers[i] = randy;Di2015NewLine        if (randy < minInt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            minInt = randy;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            if (randy > maxInt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxInt = randy;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        if (randomNumbers[i] % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            evenNumbers++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatorrange
12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatorminInt
12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatormaxInt
12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatorif < elseif >
12903438Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void GenerateNumbers(ref int evenNumbers,  ref int minInt,  ref int maxInt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random numberGenerator = new Random();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int randomNumber = numberGenerator.Next(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (randomNumber < minInt)Di2015NewLine            minInt = randomNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (randomNumber > maxInt)Di2015NewLine            maxInt = randomNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (randomNumber % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine            evenNumbers++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12910770Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Extensions Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void TimesWhile(this int count, Func<bool> predicate, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count && predicate(); i++) Di2015NewLine           action();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void TimesUntil(this int count, Func<bool> predicate, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count && !predicate(); i++) Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12910849Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T CreateCopy<T>(this T src)Di2015NewLine        where T: new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (src == null) return default(T); // just return nullDi2015NewLine        T tgt = new T(); // create new instanceDi2015NewLine        // then copy all propertiesDi2015NewLine        foreach (var pS in src.GetType().GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var pT in tgt.GetType().GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (pT.Name != pS.Name) continue;Di2015NewLine                (pT.GetSetMethod()).Invoke(tgt, new object[] { Di2015NewLine                    pS.GetGetMethod().Invoke(src, null) });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        return tgt;Di2015NewLine    } // methodDi2015NewLine} // classDi2015NewLine

12917800Di2015UniqueSeparatorFound by loop, 974 ms Di2015NewLineFound by IndexOf 1144 msDi2015NewLine
12917800Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const string target = "abbbdbsdbsbbdbsabdbsabaababababafhdfhffadfd";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Jit methodsDi2015NewLine            TimeMethod(FoundIndexesLoop, target, 1);Di2015NewLine            TimeMethod(FoundIndexesIndexOf, target, 1);            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Found by loop, {0} ms", TimeMethod(FoundIndexesLoop, target, 2000000));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Found by IndexOf {0} ms", TimeMethod(FoundIndexesIndexOf, target, 2000000));           Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static long TimeMethod(Func<string, List<int>> method, string input, int reps)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine            List<int> result = null;Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < reps; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = method(input);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            stopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine            TextWriter.Null.Write(result);Di2015NewLine            return stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<int> FoundIndexesIndexOf(string s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<int> indexes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = s.IndexOf('a'); i > -1; i = s.IndexOf('a', i + 1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 // for loop end when i=-1 ('a' not found)Di2015NewLine                indexes.Add(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return indexes;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<int> FoundIndexesLoop(string s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var indexes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < s.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (s[i] == 'a')Di2015NewLine                indexes.Add(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return indexes;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12919279Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T CloneBySerialization<T>(this T source) where T : EntityObject {Di2015NewLine    var serializer = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    using (var ios = new MemoryStream()) {Di2015NewLine        serializer.WriteObject(ios, source);Di2015NewLine        ios.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        return ((T) serializer.ReadObject(ios));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12919279Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ClearReferences(this EntityObject entity) {Di2015NewLine    if (entity == null)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var p in entity.GetType().GetProperties()) {Di2015NewLine        if (p.PropertyType.IsGenericType) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var propertyType = p.PropertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyType == typeof(EntityReference<>)) {Di2015NewLine                var reference = p.GetValue(entity) as dynamic;Di2015NewLine                if (reference.EntityKey != null) {Di2015NewLine                    reference.EntityKey = null;Di2015NewLine                    ((EntityObject) reference.Value).ClearReferences();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyType == typeof(EntityCollection<>)) {Di2015NewLine                var children = (p.GetValue(entity) as IEnumerable<EntityObject>).ToList(); // covarianceDi2015NewLine                foreach (var child in children)Di2015NewLine                    child.ClearReferences();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12920089Di2015UniqueSeparator//Assume managerName is "Mark" and employeeName is "Jim", as in your example aboveDi2015NewLinepublic bool isManagerValid(string managerName, string employeeName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool valid = true;Di2015NewLine    var manager = getEmployee("Mark"); //The "to-be" manager of JimDi2015NewLine    var employee= getEmployee("Jim");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var currentManager = getEmployee(manager.Manager); //Get Marks managerDi2015NewLine    while(currentManager != null && valid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(currentManager == employee)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            valid = false; //Some manager up the line from Mark is already Jim Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Get the next manager upDi2015NewLine            currentManager = getEmployee(currentManager.Manager);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return valid;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12920576Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SetEditablePermissionOnConfigFilesFolder(IDictionary savedState)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Context.Parameters.ContainsKey("installpath")) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get the "home" directory of the applicationDi2015NewLine        var path = Path.GetFullPath(Context.Parameters["installpath"]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //in my case the necessary files are under a ConfigFiles folder;Di2015NewLine        //you can do something similar with individual filesDi2015NewLine        path = Path.Combine(path, "ConfigFiles");Di2015NewLine        var dirInfo = new DirectoryInfo(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var accessControl = dirInfo.GetAccessControl();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Give every user of the local machine rights to modify all filesDi2015NewLine        //and subfolders in the directoryDi2015NewLine        var userGroup = new NTAccount("BUILTIN\\\\Users");Di2015NewLine        var userIdentityReference = userGroup.Translate(typeof(SecurityIdentifier));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        accessControl.SetAccessRule(Di2015NewLine            new FileSystemAccessRule(userIdentityReference,Di2015NewLine                                     FileSystemRights.Modify,Di2015NewLine                                     InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit Di2015NewLine                                        | InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit,Di2015NewLine                                     PropagationFlags.None,Di2015NewLine                                     AccessControlType.Allow));Di2015NewLine        //Commit the changes.Di2015NewLine        dirInfo.SetAccessControl(accessControl);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12923917Di2015UniqueSeparator/// make sure the XML doesn't have errors, such as non-printable charactersDi2015NewLineprivate static bool IsXmlMalformed(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var reader = new XmlTextReader(fileName);Di2015NewLine    var result = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (reader.Read()) ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// Process the XML using deserializer and VS-generated XML proxy classesDi2015NewLineprivate static void ParseVisitedLinksListXml(string fileName, List<string> urlList, List<int> invalidUrls)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (IsXmlMalformed(fileName))Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("XML is not well-formed.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var textReader = new XmlTextReader(fileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(visited_links_list));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!serializer.CanDeserialize(textReader))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Can't deserialize this XML. 12925066Di2015UniqueSeparator        private List<byte> Finalize(List<byte> packet)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i = 1;Di2015NewLine            while (i < packet.Count-1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (packet[i] == 0x7D)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    packet[i] = 0x7D;Di2015NewLine                    packet.Insert(i+1, 0x5D);Di2015NewLine                    i += 2;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (packet[i] == 0x7E) //Sync ByteDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    packet[i] = 0x7D;Di2015NewLine                    packet.Insert(i+1, 0x5E);Di2015NewLine                    i += 2;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return packet;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine

static Tuple<List<string>, List<string>, string, string, string> InterperetName(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var segments = name.Split(" ".ToCharArray(), StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> titles = new List<string>(),Di2015NewLine            firstNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        string middleName = null, lastName = null, suffix = null;Di2015NewLine        int segment = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < segments.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var s = segments[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (segment)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 0:Di2015NewLine                    if (_titles.Contains(s))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        titles.Add(s);Di2015NewLine                        if (segments[i + 1].IsJoiner())Di2015NewLine                  if (segments[i + 1].IsJoiner())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        i++;Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    segment++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 2:Di2015NewLine                    if ((i + 1) == segments.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        segment++;Di2015NewLine                        goto case 3;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine     goto case 3;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    middleName = s;Di2015NewLine                    segment++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case 4:Di2015NewLine                    if (_suffixes.Contains(s))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        suffix = s;Di2015NewLine ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal static bool IsJoiner(this string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var val = s.ToLower().Trim();Di2015NewLine        return val == "and" || val == "&";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12927482Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<TKey, List<TValue>> mEventDict;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Subscribe(TKey inEvent, TValue inCallbackMethod)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<TValue> list;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (mEventDict.TryGetValue(inEvent, out list))Di2015NewLine        list.Add(inCallbackMethod);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        mEventDict.Add(inEvent, new List<TValue> { inCallbackMethod });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool Unsubscribe(TKey inEvent, TValue inCallbackMethod)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<TValue> list;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!mEventDict.TryGetValue(inEvent, out list))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool removed = list.Remove(inCallbackMethod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (list.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        mEventDict.Remove(inEvent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return removed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12934039Di2015UniqueSeparatorparent.Children
12934039Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void draw(int args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        parent.Children.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<MyCanvas> children = fetchManyChildren(100);Di2015NewLine        Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (MyCanvas child in children)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while(true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Choose a random place on Canvas we would like to place childDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                child.xPos = nextDouble(rand, 0, parent.ActualWidth - child.Width);Di2015NewLine                child.yPos = nextDouble(rand, 0, parent.ActualHeight - child.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Now see if it collides with ones already on CanvasDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool bCollisionDetected = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (MyCanvas sibling in parent.Children)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bCollisionDetected = child.collidesWith(sibling);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (bCollisionDetected)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!bCollisionDetected) // Was able to place child in free positionDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Canvas.SetLeft(child, child.xPos);Di2015NewLine            Canvas.SetTop(child, child.yPos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            parent.Children.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12934380Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer<Object[]>
12934380Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ObjectArrayComparer : IEqualityComparer<Object[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Object[] x, Object[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == null && y == null) return true;Di2015NewLine        if (x == null || y == null) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length  !=  y.Length) return false;       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (x[i] == null && y[i] == null) continue;Di2015NewLine            if (x[i] == null || y[i] == null) return false;Di2015NewLine            if (!x[i].Equals(y[i])) return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(Object[] obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (obj != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash = (hash * 17) + obj.Length;Di2015NewLine            foreach (Object o in obj)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hash *= 17;Di2015NewLine                if (o != null) hash = hash + o.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12934380Di2015UniqueSeparatorRemoveDuplicateRows
12934380Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DataTable RemoveDuplicateRows(DataTable dTable, String[] colNames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var hTable = new Dictionary<object[], DataRow>(new ObjectArrayComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow drow in dTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Object[] objects = new Object[colNames.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (int c = 0; c < colNames.Length; c++)Di2015NewLine            objects[c] = drow[colNames[c]];Di2015NewLine        if (!hTable.ContainsKey(objects))Di2015NewLine            hTable.Add(objects, drow);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create a clone with the same columns and import all distinct rowsDi2015NewLine    DataTable clone = dTable.Clone();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var kv in hTable)Di2015NewLine        clone.ImportRow(kv.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return clone;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12935694Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Visual_ExtensionMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T FindDescendant<T>(this Visual @this, Predicate<T> predicate = null) where T : VisualDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return @this.FindDescendant(v => v is T && (predicate == null || predicate((T)v))) as T;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Visual FindDescendant(this Visual @this, Predicate<Visual> predicate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (@this == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var frameworkElement = @this as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine        if (frameworkElement != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.ApplyTemplate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Visual child = null;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0, count = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(@this); i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(@this, i) as Visual;Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(child))Di2015NewLine                return child;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            child = child.FindDescendant(predicate);Di2015NewLine            if (child != null)Di2015NewLine                return child;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return child;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class GridAdorner : AdornerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public GridAdorner(MyDataGrid dataGrid)Di2015NewLine        : base(dataGrid)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine        base.OnRender(drawingContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var myDataGrid = AdornedElement as MyDataGrid;Di2015NewLine        if (myDataGrid == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Draw Horizontal linesDi2015NewLine        var lastRowBottomOffset = myDataGrid.LastRowBottomOffset;Di2015NewLine        var remainingSpace = myDataGrid.RenderSize.Height - lastRowBottomOffset;Di2015NewLine        var placeHolderRowHeight = myDataGrid.PlaceHolderRowHeight;Di2015NewLine        var lineNumber = (int)(Math.Floor(remainingSpace / placeHolderRowHeight));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= lineNumber; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rect rectangle = new Rect(new Size(base.RenderSize.Width, 1)) { Y = lastRowBottomOffset + (i * placeHolderRowHeight) };Di2015NewLine            drawingContext.DrawRectangle(Brushes.Black, null, rectangle);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Draw vertical linesDi2015NewLine        var reorderedColumns = myDataGrid.Columns.OrderBy(c => c.DisplayIndex);Di2015NewLine        double verticalLineOffset = - myDataGrid.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var column in reorderedColumns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            verticalLineOffset += column.ActualWidth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Rect rectangle = new Rect(new Size(1, Math.Max(0, remainingSpace))) { X = verticalLineOffset, Y = lastRowBottomOffset };Di2015NewLine 12938910Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic double GetRandomNumber()Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    //Between 0 and 1Di2015NewLine    Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine    double randomNumber = random.NextDouble();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Between -0.5 and 0.5;Di2015NewLine    randomNumber -= 0.5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Between -5.0 and 5.0;Di2015NewLine    randomNumber *= 10.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Between [-15.0, -10.0] or [10.0, 15.0]Di2015NewLine    randomNumber += Math.Sign(randomNumber) * 10.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return randomNumber;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12939284Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.IO.StreamReader sr = new System.IO.StreamReader("test.xml");Di2015NewLineString xmlText = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLinesr.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<UserInfo> finalList = readXMLDoc(xmlText);Di2015NewLineif(finalList != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //do somethingDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<UserInfo> readXMLDoc(String fileText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //create a list of Strings to hold our user informationDi2015NewLine        List<UserInfo> userList = new List<UserInfo>();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //create a XmlDocument ObjectDi2015NewLine            XmlDocument xDoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine            //load the text of the file into the XmlDocument ObjectDi2015NewLine            xDoc.LoadXml(fileText);Di2015NewLine            //Create a XmlNode object to hold the root node of the XmlDocumentDi2015NewLine            XmlNode rootNode = null;Di2015NewLine            //get the root element in the xml documentDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < xDoc.ChildNodes.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //check to see if we hit the root elementDi2015NewLine                if (xDoc.ChildNodes[i].Name == "RootElement")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //assign the root nodeDi2015NewLine                    rootNode = xDoc.ChildNodes[i];Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Loop through each of the child nodes of the root nodeDi2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < rootNode.ChildNodes.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //check for the UserInformation tagDi2015NewLine                if (rootNode.ChildNodes[j].Name == "UserInformation")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //assign the item nodeDi2015NewLine                    XmlNode userNode = rootNode.ChildNodes[j];Di2015NewLine                    //create userInfo object to hold resultsDi2015NewLine                    UserInfo userInfo = new UserInfo();Di2015NewLine                    //loop through each if the user tag's elementsDi2015NewLine                    foreach (XmlNode subNode in userNode.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //check for the name tagDi2015NewLine                        if (subNode.Name == "Name")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            userInfo._name = subNode.InnerText;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        //check for the age tagDi2015NewLine                        if (subNode.Name == "Age")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            userInfo._age = subNode.InnerText;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        String tagToLookFor = "CallTheMethodThatReturnsTheCorrectTag";Di2015NewLine                        //check for the tagDi2015NewLine                        if (subNode.Name == tagToLookFor)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            foreach (XmlNode elementNode in subNode.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                //check for the element1 tagDi2015NewLine                                if (elementNode.Name == "Element1")Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    userInfo._element1 = elementNode.InnerText;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                //check for the element2 tagDi2015NewLine                                if (elementNode.Name == "Element2")Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    userInfo._element2 = elementNode.InnerText;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                //check for the element3 tagDi2015NewLine                                if (elementNode.Name == "Element3")Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    userInfo._element3 = elementNode.InnerText;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    //add the userInfo to the listDi2015NewLine                    userList.Add(userInfo);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //return the listDi2015NewLine        return userList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //struct to hold informationDi2015NewLine    struct UserInfoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public String _name;Di2015NewLine        public String _age;Di2015NewLine        public String _element1;Di2015NewLine        public String _element2;Di2015NewLine        public String _element3;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12944285Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ModelBinder : DefaultModelBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override object BindModel (ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ModelType = bindingContext.ModelType;Di2015NewLine        var Instance = Activator.CreateInstance(ModelType);Di2015NewLine        var Form = bindingContext.ValueProvider;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var Property in ModelType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type PropertyType = Property.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // I'm using an ORM so this checks whether or not the property is aDi2015NewLine            // reference to another objectDi2015NewLine            if (!(PropertyType.GetGenericArguments().Count() > 0 ))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This is the not so generic part.  It really just checks whether or Di2015NewLine                // not it is a custom object.  Also the .Load() method is specificDi2015NewLine                // to the ORMDi2015NewLine                if (PropertyType.FullName.StartsWith("Objects.Models"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var Load = PropertyType.GetMethod("Load", BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.Static, null, new Type[] { typeof(long) }, null);Di2015NewLine                    var Value = Load.Invoke(new object(), new object[] { long.Parse(Form.GetValue(Property.Name + ".ID").AttemptedValue) });Di2015NewLine                    Property.SetValue(Instance, Value, null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // checkboxes are weird and require a special caseDi2015NewLine                else if (PropertyType.Equals(typeof(bool)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (Form.GetValue(Property.Name) == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Property.SetValue(Instance, false, null);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (Form.GetValue(Property.Name).Equals("on"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Property.SetValue(Instance, true, null);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Property.SetValue(Instance, Convert.ChangeType(bindingContext.ValueProvider.GetValue(Property.Name).AttemptedValue, PropertyType), null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Instance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12945637Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ControlElement : UserControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine      private Timer tick;Di2015NewLine      private Point pT0;Di2015NewLine      public ControlElement() : base()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine            tick = new Timer();Di2015NewLine            tick.Interval = 30; // about 30fpsDi2015NewLine            tick.Tick += new EventHandler(tick_Tick);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      void tick_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine            // get the new point from distance and current location/destinationDi2015NewLine            this.Location = Utils.Transform(this.Location, pT0, 3);Di2015NewLine            if ((pT0.X - this.Location.X)+(pT0.Y - this.Location.Y) <= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Location = pT0;Di2015NewLine                tick.Stop();Di2015NewLine                //this.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      public void Transform(Point destination)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine            pT0 = destination;Di2015NewLine            //this.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine            tick.Start();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12946635Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // public int CustomerID { get; set; } // Database specific primary keyDi2015NewLine    public string Title { get; set; } Di2015NewLine    public string FirstName { get; set; } // Is the setter required to be publicly exposed? 12946643Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class XYPointDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int X;Di2015NewLine    public double Y;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static List<XYPoint> GenerateLinearBestFit(List<XYPoint> points, out double a, out double b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int numPoints = points.Count;Di2015NewLine        double meanX = points.Average(point => point.X);Di2015NewLine        double meanY = points.Average(point => point.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double sumXSquared = points.Sum(point => point.X * point.X);Di2015NewLine        double sumXY = points.Sum(point => point.X * point.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        a = (sumXY / numPoints - meanX * meanY) / (sumXSquared / numPoints - meanX * meanX);Di2015NewLine        b = (a * meanX - meanY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double a1 = a;Di2015NewLine        double b1 = b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return points.Select(point => new XYPoint() { X = point.X, Y = a1 * point.X - b1 }).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<XYPoint> points = new List<XYPoint>()Di2015NewLine                                   {Di2015NewLine                                       new XYPoint() {X = 1, Y = 12},Di2015NewLine                                       new XYPoint() {X = 2, Y = 16},Di2015NewLine                                       new XYPoint() {X = 3, Y = 34},Di2015NewLine                                       new XYPoint() {X = 4, Y = 45},Di2015NewLine                                       new XYPoint() {X = 5, Y = 47}Di2015NewLine                                   };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double a, b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<XYPoint> bestFit = GenerateLinearBestFit(points, out a, out b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("y = {0:#.####}x {1:+#.####;-#.####}", a, -b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int index = 0; index < points.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("X = {0}, Y = {1}, Fit = {2:#.###}", points[index].X, points[index].Y, bestFit[index].Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12948995Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable InnerJoin(DataTable dt1, DataTable dt2, DataColumn Parent, DataColumn Child)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable result = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    result.Columns.Add("Row1", typeof(DataRow));Di2015NewLine    result.Columns.Add("Row2", typeof(DataRow));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var query =Di2015NewLine        from row1 in dt1.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine        join row2 in dt2.AsEnumerable() on row1[Parent] equals row2[Child]Di2015NewLine        select new { row1, row2 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var x in query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Rows.Add(x.row1, x.row2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12948995Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable table1 = new DataTable("table1");Di2015NewLinetable1.Columns.Add("ID", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinetable1.Columns.Add("Name", typeof(String));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineobject[] a1 = { 1, "T1Row1Name" };Di2015NewLineobject[] a2 = { 2, "T1Row2Name" };Di2015NewLineobject[] a3 = { 3, "T1Row3Name" };Di2015NewLineobject[] a4 = { 4, "T1Row4Name" };Di2015NewLinetable1.Rows.Add(a1);Di2015NewLinetable1.Rows.Add(a2);Di2015NewLinetable1.Rows.Add(a3);Di2015NewLinetable1.Rows.Add(a4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDataTable table2 = new DataTable("table2");Di2015NewLinetable2.Columns.Add("ID", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinetable2.Columns.Add("Name", typeof(String));Di2015NewLinetable2.Columns.Add("Table1ID", typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineobject[] b1 = { 1, "T2Row1Name", 1 };Di2015NewLineobject[] b2 = { 2, "T2Row2Name", 2 };Di2015NewLineobject[] b3 = { 3, "T2Row3Name", 2 };Di2015NewLineobject[] b4 = { 4, "T2Row4Name", 2 };Di2015NewLineobject[] b5 = { 5, "T2Row5Name", 3 };Di2015NewLinetable2.Rows.Add(b1);Di2015NewLinetable2.Rows.Add(b2);Di2015NewLinetable2.Rows.Add(b3);Di2015NewLinetable2.Rows.Add(b4);Di2015NewLinetable2.Rows.Add(b5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar joinedTable = InnerJoin(table1, table2, table1.Columns["ID"], table2.Columns["Table1ID"]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (DataRow r in joinedTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataRow r1 = r.Field<DataRow>("Row1");Di2015NewLine    DataRow r2 = r.Field<DataRow>("Row2");Di2015NewLine    String r1Name = r1.Field<String>("Name");Di2015NewLine    String r2Name = r2.Field<String>("Name");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12949138Di2015UniqueSeparatorLazy<Thread>
12949138Di2015UniqueSeparatorLazy<Thread>
12949138Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int running;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void runThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref running, 1, 0) == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread t = new ThreadDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    go();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catchDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Without the catch any exceptions will be unhandledDi2015NewLine                    //(Maybe that's what you want, maybe not*)Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Regardless of exceptions, we need this to happen:Di2015NewLine                    running = 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        t.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        t.Name = "myThread";Di2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("myThreadis already Running.");Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void go()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //My work goes hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12950500Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool MobileBrowserDetected()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var context = HttpContext.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var userAgent = context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_USER_AGENT"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (userAgent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            userAgent = userAgent.ToLower();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Checks the user-agentDi2015NewLine        if (userAgent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Checks if its a Windows browser but not a Windows Mobile browserDi2015NewLine            if (userAgent.Contains("windows") && !userAgent.Contains("windows ce") && !userAgent.Contains("iemobile"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Checks if it is a mobile browserDi2015NewLine            const string pattern = "up.browser|up.link|windows ce|iphone|iemobile|mini|mmp|symbian|midp|wap|phone|pocket|mobile|pda|psp|android";Di2015NewLine            var mc = Regex.Matches(userAgent, pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine            if (mc.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Checks if the 4 first chars of the user-agent match any of the most popular user-agentsDi2015NewLine            const string popularUserAgent = "|acs-|alav|alca|amoi|audi|aste|avan|benq|bird|blac|blaz|brew|cell|cldc|cmd-|dang|doco|eric|hipt|inno|ipaq|java|jigs|kddi|keji|leno|lg-c|lg-d|lg-g|lge-|maui|maxo|midp|mits|mmef|mobi|mot-|moto|mwbp|nec-|newt|noki|opwv|palm|pana|pant|pdxg|phil|play|pluc|port|prox|qtek|qwap|sage|sams|sany|sch-|sec-|send|seri|sgh-|shar|sie-|siem|smal|smar|sony|sph-|symb|t-mo|teli|tim-|tosh|tsm-|upg1|upsi|vk-v|voda|w3c |wap-|wapa|wapi|wapp|wapr|webc|winw|winw|xda|xda-|";Di2015NewLine            if (popularUserAgent.Contains("|" + userAgent.Substring(0, 4) + "|"))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Checks the accept header for wap.wml or wap.xhtml supportDi2015NewLine        var accept = context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_ACCEPT"];Di2015NewLine        if (accept != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (accept.Contains("text/vnd.wap.wml") || accept.Contains("application/vnd.wap.xhtml+xml"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Checks if it has any mobile HTTP headersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var xWapProfile = context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_X_WAP_PROFILE"];Di2015NewLine        var profile = context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_PROFILE"];Di2015NewLine        var opera = context.Request.Headers["HTTP_X_OPERAMINI_PHONE_UA"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return xWapProfile != null || profile != null || opera != null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//INotifyPropertyChanged, so that binding engine knows when source gets updatedDi2015NewLineinternal class Source : }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void OnPropertyChanged(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handler(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler
