Destination(Source src)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Binder for Source no 1Di2015NewLine        _binder = new BindingEngine<Destination>(this, src, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class BindingEngine<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly T _destination;Di2015NewLine    private readonly PropertyDescriptorCollection _sourceProperties;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<string, PropertyDescriptor> _srcToDestMapping;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BindingEngine(T destination, INotifyPropertyChanged source, int srcId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _destination = destination;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get a list of destination propertiesDi2015NewLine        PropertyDescriptorCollection destinationProperties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(destination);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get a list of source propertiesDi2015NewLine        _sourceProperties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This is the source property to destination property mappingDi2015NewLine        _srcToDestMapping = new Dictionary<string, PropertyDescriptor>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //listen for INotifyPropertyChanged event on the sourceDi2015NewLine        source.PropertyChanged += SourcePropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyDescriptor property in destinationProperties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Prepare the mapping.Di2015NewLine            //Add those properties for which binding has been definedDi2015NewLine            var attribute = (BindToAttribute)property.Attributes[typeof(BindToAttribute)];Di2015NewLine            if (attribute != null && attribute.SourceId == srcId)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _srcToDestMapping[attribute.PropertyName] = property;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void SourcePropertyChanged(object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_srcToDestMapping.ContainsKey(args.PropertyName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Get the destination property from mapping and update itDi2015NewLine            _srcToDestMapping[args.PropertyName].SetValue(_destination, _sourceProperties[args.PropertyName].GetValue(sender));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12953633Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar worker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLineworker.WorkerReportsProgress = true;Di2015NewLineworker.WorkerSupportsCancellation = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineworker.ProgressChanged += (s, args) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(args.UserState);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineworker.DoWork += (s, args) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // startup the server on localhostDi2015NewLine    var ipAddress = Dns.GetHostEntry("localhost").AddressList[0];Di2015NewLine    TcpListener server = new TcpListener(ipAddress, clientPort);Di2015NewLine    server.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (!worker.CancellationPending)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // as long as we're not pending a cancellation, let's keep accepting requestsDi2015NewLine        TcpClient client = server.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StreamReader clientIn = new StreamReader(client.GetStream());Di2015NewLine        StreamWriter clientOut = new StreamWriter(client.GetStream());Di2015NewLine        clientOut.AutoFlush = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ((string msg = clientIn.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            worker.ReportProgress(1, msg);  // this will fire the ProgressChanged eventDi2015NewLine            clientOut.WriteLine(msg);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12954849Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Loader<TFuncResult,TFirstArgType>:FrameworkElementDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Func<TFirstArgType,TFuncResult> _execute;Di2015NewLine    public TFuncResult Result { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public delegate void OnJobFinished(object sender, TFuncResult result);Di2015NewLine    public event OnJobFinished JobFinished;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Loader(Func<TFirstArgType,TFuncResult> execute)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (execute == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("execute");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _execute = execute;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Window GetWaitWindow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Window waitWindow = new Window { Height = 100, Width = 200, WindowStartupLocation = WindowStartupLocation.CenterScreen, WindowStyle = WindowStyle.None };Di2015NewLine        waitWindow.Content = new TextBlock { Text = "Please Wait", FontSize = 30, FontWeight = FontWeights.Bold, HorizontalAlignment = HorizontalAlignment.Center, VerticalAlignment = VerticalAlignment.Center };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return waitWindow;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Load(TFirstArgType firstarg, Window waitWindow = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (waitWindow == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            waitWindow = GetWaitWindow();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        BackgroundWorker worker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine        worker.DoWork += delegateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(new Action(delegate { waitWindow.ShowDialog(); }));Di2015NewLine            Result = _execute(firstarg);Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(new Action(delegate() { waitWindow.Close(); }));Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        worker.RunWorkerCompleted += delegateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            worker.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            if (JobFinished != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                JobFinished(this, Result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        worker.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12956274Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void button2_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var GoldIron = new List<Point>(Di2015NewLine        new Point[]{Di2015NewLine        new Point(16,23),new Point(16,28),new Point(19,44),new Point(21,29),Di2015NewLine        new Point(23,16),new Point(24,82),new Point(27,85),new Point(31,63),Di2015NewLine        new Point(31,78),new Point(32,65),new Point(41,23),new Point(43,79),Di2015NewLine        new Point(44,76),new Point(45,23),new Point(47,16),new Point(50,15),Di2015NewLine        new Point(50,37),new Point(52,28),new Point(52,58),new Point(52,71),Di2015NewLine        new Point(61,39),new Point(61,75),new Point(63,59),new Point(68,25),Di2015NewLine        new Point(68,61),new Point(70,24),new Point(71,75),new Point(74,78),Di2015NewLine        new Point(77,59),new Point(82,27)}Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        listBox1.DataSource = GoldIron;Di2015NewLine        //Split into 2 lists based on the gold amountDi2015NewLine        var Left = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLine        var Right = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLine        var SumGold = GoldIron.Sum(P => P.X);Di2015NewLine        var SumIron = GoldIron.Sum(P => P.Y);Di2015NewLine        label2.Text = SumGold.ToString();Di2015NewLine        label1.Text = SumIron.ToString();Di2015NewLine        var LeftGold = 0;Di2015NewLine        Int32 i = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (LeftGold < SumGold / 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LeftGold += GoldIron[i].X;Di2015NewLine            Left.Add(GoldIron[i++]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (i < GoldIron.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Right.Add(GoldIron[i++]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Int32 LIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        //Start AlgorithmDi2015NewLine        Int32 LeftIron = Left.Sum(P => P.Y);Di2015NewLine        Int32 RightIron = Right.Sum(P => P.Y);Di2015NewLine        while (LeftIron - RightIron > 50 || RightIron - LeftIron > 50)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (LeftIron < RightIron)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<Point> TempList = Left;Di2015NewLine                Left = Right;Di2015NewLine                Right = TempList;Di2015NewLine                LIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Int32 SmallestRight = Right[LIndex].X;Di2015NewLine            LeftGold = 0;Di2015NewLine            i = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (LeftGold < SmallestRight)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LeftGold += Right[i++].X;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Point Temp = Right[LIndex];Di2015NewLine            Right.RemoveAt(LIndex);Di2015NewLine            Right.AddRange(Left.Take(i));Di2015NewLine            Left.RemoveRange(0, i);Di2015NewLine            Left.Add(Temp);Di2015NewLine            LIndex += i;Di2015NewLine            //SortDi2015NewLine            Left.Sort(CompareGold);Di2015NewLine            Right.Sort(CompareGold);Di2015NewLine            LeftIron = Left.Sum(P => P.Y);Di2015NewLine            RightIron = Right.Sum(P => P.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        listBox2.DataSource = Left;Di2015NewLine        SumGold = Left.Sum(P => P.X);Di2015NewLine        SumIron = Left.Sum(P => P.Y);Di2015NewLine        label4.Text = SumGold.ToString();Di2015NewLine        label3.Text = SumIron.ToString();Di2015NewLine        listBox3.DataSource = Right;Di2015NewLine        SumGold = Right.Sum(P => P.X);Di2015NewLine        SumIron = Right.Sum(P => P.Y);Di2015NewLine        label6.Text = SumGold.ToString();Di2015NewLine        label5.Text = SumIron.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12957705Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Flatten<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HashSet<T> added = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    Queue<T> queue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach(T t in source)Di2015NewLine        if (added.Add(t))Di2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(t);Di2015NewLine    while (queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T current = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        yield return current;Di2015NewLine        if (current != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<T> children = childSelector(current);Di2015NewLine            if (children != null)Di2015NewLine                foreach(T t in childSelector(current))Di2015NewLine                    if (added.Add(t))Di2015NewLine                        queue.Enqueue(t);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12965737Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int[] BubbleSort(int[] ints)Di2015NewLine{            Di2015NewLine    bool swapped = true;Di2015NewLine    while (swapped) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        swapped = false;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ints[i] > ints[i + 1])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                swapped = true;Di2015NewLine                int tempValue = ints[i];Di2015NewLine                ints[i] = ints[i + 1];Di2015NewLine                ints[i + 1] = tempValue;Di2015NewLine            }     Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ints;               Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12967919Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication6Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const string frag = @" <websites>Di2015NewLine <site>Di2015NewLine <a xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"" href=""www.google.com""> Google </a>Di2015NewLine </site>Di2015NewLine <site>Di2015NewLine <a xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"" href=""www.hotmail.com""> Hotmail </a>Di2015NewLine </site>Di2015NewLine </websites>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var doc = XDocument.Parse(frag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Locate all the elements that contain the attribute you're looking forDi2015NewLine            var invalidEntries = doc.Document.Descendants().Where(x =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Get the href attribute from the elementDi2015NewLine                var hrefAttribute = x.Attribute("href");Di2015NewLine                //Check to see if the attribute existed, and, if it did, if it has the value you're looking forDi2015NewLine                return hrefAttribute != null && hrefAttribute.Value.Contains("www.google.com");Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Find the site elements that are the parents of the elements that contain bad entriesDi2015NewLine            var toRemove = invalidEntries.Select(x => x.Ancestors("site").First()).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //For each of the site elements that should be removed, remove themDi2015NewLine            foreach(var entry in toRemove)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                entry.Remove();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Debugger.Break();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12968149Di2015UniqueSeparatorSTART TRANSACTION;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT MAX(id) INTO @var_max_id FROM table_name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO table_name VALUES(..),(..),...;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT MAX(id) INTO @var_max_id_new FROM table_name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOMMIT;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT * Di2015NewLineFROM table_name Di2015NewLineWHERE id BETWEEN (@var_max_id + 1) AND @var_max_id_new;Di2015NewLine

    var miGenericHelper = Di2015NewLine            typeof(Instantiator<T>).GetMethod("SetValueMethodHelper", Di2015NewLine                                              BindingFlags.Static | parameters[1].ParameterType,Di2015NewLine                                      parameters[2].ParameterType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var retVal = miConstructedHelper.Invoke(null, new object[] { pMethod });Di2015NewLine        return (Action<G, object, object, object>) retVal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Action<TTarget, object, object, object> TParam3>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<TTarget, TParam1, TParam2, TParam3>), pMethod);Di2015NewLine        Action<TTarget, object, object, object> retVal =Di2015NewLine            (target, 12975963Di2015UniqueSeparator public DataTable GetDataTableFromTextFile(string filepath) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine                                string line;Di2015NewLine                                DataTable dt = new DataTable();                         Di2015NewLine                                using (TextReader tr = File.OpenText(filepath))Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    while ((line = tr.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        string[] items = line.Split('\\t',":",";","=");Di2015NewLine                                        if (dt.Columns.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            dt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("FirstColumn", typeof(string)));Di2015NewLine                                            dt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("SecondColumn", typeof(string)));Di2015NewLine                                            dt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("ThridColumn", typeof(string)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                        if (items.Length > 0 && !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(items[0].ToString()))Di2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            dt.Rows.Add(items);                                       Di2015NewLine                                        }Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine    return dt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

(Di2015NewLine  ProductID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, Di2015NewLine  ProductName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine  ProductDescription VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine  ProductPrice MONEY NOT INT NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine  ChangeTime DATETIME NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine  ChangeType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine) Di2015NewLineGO Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TRIGGER tr_Product ON Product Di2015NewLineFOR UPDATEDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  INSERT ProductChangeLog (ProductID, ChangeTime, ChangeType) Di2015NewLine  SELECT Di2015NewLine    ProductID,Di2015NewLine    GETDATE(),Di2015NewLine    -- Log the process which was run depending on columns modifiedDi2015NewLine    CASE WHEN UPDATE(ProductName) OR UPDATE(ProductDescription)Di2015NewLine         THEN 'Process1'Di2015NewLine         WHEN UPDATE(ProductPrice) OR UPDATE(ProductAvailQty)Di2015NewLine         THEN 'Process2'Di2015NewLine         ELSE 'Neither'Di2015NewLine    END Di2015NewLine  FROM insertedDi2015NewLineGO Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT Product Di2015NewLineSELECT 1, 'Blue V-Neck', 'Sweater', 25.00, 100 UNION ALL Di2015NewLineSELECT 2, 'Green V-Neck', 'Sweater', 30.00, 200 UNION ALLDi2015NewLineSELECT 3, 'Black crew', 'T-Shirt', 10.00, 45Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Change two products in first process */Di2015NewLineUPDATE Product Di2015NewLineSET ProductDescription = 'Men''s Sweater' Di2015NewLineWHERE ProductDescription = 'Sweater'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Change three products in second process */Di2015NewLineUPDATE ProductDi2015NewLineSET ProductPrice = ProductPrice + 10Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* See all changes */Di2015NewLineSELECT * Di2015NewLineFROM ProductChangeLog Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @today DATETIMEDi2015NewLineSET @today = DATEADD(DAY, 0, DATEDIFF(DAY, 0, GETDATE())) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* See all products changed today by both processes */Di2015NewLineSELECT * Di2015NewLineFROM Product p Di2015NewLineWHERE EXISTS (Di2015NewLine  SELECT * Di2015NewLine  FROM ProductChangeLog Di2015NewLine  WHERE ChangeType = 'Process1'Di2015NewLine    AND ChangeTime > @today Di2015NewLine    AND ProductID = p.ProductID Di2015NewLine) Di2015NewLineAND EXISTS ( Di2015NewLine  SELECT * Di2015NewLine  FROM ProductChangeLog Di2015NewLine  WHERE ChangeType = 'Process2'Di2015NewLine    AND ChangeTime > @today Di2015NewLine    AND ProductID = p.ProductID Di2015NewLine) Di2015NewLine

12989244Di2015UniqueSeparatorNow, the way the JS/CSS minifying works is that it will dynamically inspect all your files, read them, minify them and then cache the result to be served later. This allows us to modify our files and have all the files re-minified. When one of our JS/CSS files get modified again, this process will restart until either the cache expires or a file change.

12992629Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void PaintTextJustification(Graphics g, string text, Font font, PointF location, int lineWidth, bool applyToLastLine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string[] words = text.Split(new char[] { ' ' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int wordCount = 0;Di2015NewLine  float locY = location.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (wordCount < words.Length)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder rawLine = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    List<string> lineParts = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while ((wordCount < words.Length) && (g.MeasureString(rawLine.ToString() + words[wordCount], font).Width < (float)lineWidth))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      rawLine.Append(words[wordCount] + " ");Di2015NewLine      lineParts.Add(words[wordCount] + " ");Di2015NewLine      wordCount++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string rawLineStr = rawLine.ToString().Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float padding = 0;Di2015NewLine    if ((wordCount < words.Length) || (applyToLastLine))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Only apply padding if not the last line.Di2015NewLine      padding = ((float)lineWidth - g.MeasureString(rawLineStr, font).Width) / (lineParts.Count - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float locX = location.X;Di2015NewLine    foreach (string word in lineParts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      g.DrawString(word, font, Brushes.Black, new PointF(locX, locY));Di2015NewLine      locX += g.MeasureString(word, font).Width + padding;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    locY += g.MeasureString(rawLineStr, font).Height;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12992629Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void EditButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  IntPtr hdc = richTextBox1.CreateGraphics().GetHdc();Di2015NewLine  string str = "aaa bbb ccc ddd eee fff";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SetTextJustification(hdc, 40, 5);Di2015NewLine  TextOut(hdc, 20, 20, str, str.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SetTextJustification(hdc, 10, 5);Di2015NewLine  TextOut(hdc, 20, 40, str, str.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Another Approach:Di2015NewLine  Graphics g = richTextBox1.CreateGraphics();Di2015NewLine  PaintTextJustification(g, str, richTextBox1.Font, new PointF(20f, 90f), 220, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  System.Drawing.Font newFont = new Font("Arial", 12f, FontStyle.Bold);Di2015NewLine  string longStr = "This is a very long string which will need to be split across several lines when it is justified.";Di2015NewLine  PaintTextJustification(g, longStr, newFont, new PointF(20f, 110f), 220, false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static object syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var scope = new 13000509Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct CordinationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int A;Di2015NewLine    public int B;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Cordination(int a, int b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        A = a;Di2015NewLine        B = b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic float distanceInMeter(Cordination[] cordination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float minDistance = float.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < cordination.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = i + 1; j < cordination.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float dist = (float)Math.Sqrt(Di2015NewLine                Math.Pow(cordination[i].A - cordination[j].A, 2.0) +Di2015NewLine                Math.Pow(cordination[i].B - cordination[j].B, 2.0));Di2015NewLine            if (dist < minDistance)Di2015NewLine                minDistance = dist;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return minDistance;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13001749Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Slow()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long nthPrime = FindPrimeNumber(1000); //set higher value for more timeDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic long FindPrimeNumber(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count=0;Di2015NewLine    long a = 2;Di2015NewLine    while(count<n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long b = 2;Di2015NewLine        int prime = 1;// to check if found a primeDi2015NewLine        while(b * b <= a)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(a % b == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                prime = 0;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            b++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(prime > 0)Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine        a++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (--a);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13003762Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DumpExports(typeof (string).Assembly);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DumpExports( Assembly assembly)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<Type, List<MethodInfo>> exports = assembly.GetTypes()Di2015NewLine            .SelectMany(type => type.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Static)Di2015NewLine                                    .Where(method => method.GetCustomAttributes(typeof (DllImportAttribute), false).Length > 0))Di2015NewLine            .GroupBy(method => method.DeclaringType)Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary( item => item.Key, item => item.ToList())Di2015NewLine            ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach( var item in exports )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(item.Key.FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach( var method in  item.Value )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DllImportAttribute attr = method.GetCustomAttributes(typeof (DllImportAttribute), false)[0] as DllImportAttribute;Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("\\tDLL: {0}, Function: {1}", attr.Value, method.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13005419Di2015UniqueSeparatorIComparer<string>
13005419Di2015UniqueSeparatorCompare
13005419Di2015UniqueSeparatorComparer
13005419Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomStringComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int? result;Di2015NewLine        if (AnyParamIsNull(x, y, out result))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return result.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string x1, y1;Di2015NewLine        double x2, y2;Di2015NewLine        SplitInput(x, out x1, out x2);Di2015NewLine        SplitInput(y, out y1, out y2);Di2015NewLine        if (x1.Length == y1.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = string.Compare(x1, y1);Di2015NewLine            if (result.Value == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (x2 < y2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return -1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (x2 > y2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return result.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //To make AA before Z when desendingDi2015NewLine            return x1.Length - y1.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool SplitInput(string input, out string alphabets, out double number)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Regex regex = new Regex(@"\\d*[.]?\\d+");Di2015NewLine        Match match = regex.Match(input);Di2015NewLine        if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            number = double.Parse(match.Value, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine            alphabets = input.Replace(match.Value, "");Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Input string is not of correct format", input);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool AnyParamIsNull(string x, string y, out int? result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = null;Di2015NewLine        if (x == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (y == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If x is null and y is null, they're Di2015NewLine                // equal.  Di2015NewLine                result = 0;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If x is null and y is not null, y Di2015NewLine                // is greater.  Di2015NewLine                result = -1;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If x is not null... Di2015NewLine            // Di2015NewLine            if (y == null)Di2015NewLine            // ...and y is null, x is greater.Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = 1;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13005419Di2015UniqueSeparator        List<string> input = new List<string>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            "AA.1",Di2015NewLine            "A01.1",Di2015NewLine            "A01.2",Di2015NewLine            "Z.7"Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        input.Sort(new CustomStringComparer());Di2015NewLine        //To sort decendingDi2015NewLine        input.Reverse();Di2015NewLine

13006950Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport java.util.*;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.Executors;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class JavaMonoTest {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static final AtomicInteger threadCount = new AtomicInteger();Di2015NewLine    static final AtomicInteger completeCount = new AtomicInteger();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {Di2015NewLine        final int numberOfCycles = 1000;Di2015NewLine        final int numbersPerCycle = 1000000;Di2015NewLine        final int NUM_CORES = Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long swG = System.nanoTime();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ExecutorService exec = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(NUM_CORES);Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numberOfCycles; i++) {Di2015NewLine                final int x = i;Di2015NewLine                exec.submit(new Runnable() {Di2015NewLine                    @OverrideDi2015NewLine                    public void run() {Di2015NewLine                        try {Di2015NewLine                        System.out.printf("Starting cycle %s. Thread count at %s %n", x, threadCount.getAndIncrement());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLine                        long sw = System.nanoTime();Di2015NewLine                        double[] numbers = new double[numbersPerCycle];Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < numbersPerCycle; i++) {Di2015NewLine                            numbers[i] = r.nextDouble() * 1000;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        Arrays.sort(numbers);Di2015NewLine                        double min = numbers[0];Di2015NewLine                        double max = numbers[numbers.length - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        completeCount.getAndIncrement();Di2015NewLine                        System.out.printf("%s cycles complete: %.2f ms. Min: %.2f  Max: %.2f %n",Di2015NewLine                                completeCount, (System.nanoTime() - sw) / 1e6, min, max);Di2015NewLine                        threadCount.getAndDecrement();Di2015NewLine                        } catch (Throwable t) {Di2015NewLine                            t.printStackTrace();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } finally {Di2015NewLine            exec.shutdown();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        exec.awaitTermination(1, TimeUnit.DAYS);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.out.printf("All %s cycles complete. Took %.2f ms. %n",Di2015NewLine                numberOfCycles, (System.nanoTime() - swG) / 1e6);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13008286Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SetFileToZero(string inputFile)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Remove previous backup fileDi2015NewLine    string tempFile = Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(inputFile), "saved.bin");Di2015NewLine    if(File.Exists(tempFile)) File.Delete(tempFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get current length of input file (minus 4 byte)Di2015NewLine    FileInfo fi = new FileInfo(inputFile);Di2015NewLine    int pos = Convert.ToInt32(fi.Length) - 4;Di2015NewLine    string name = fi.FullName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Move the input file to "saved.bin"Di2015NewLine    fi.MoveTo(tempFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a zero byte length file with the requested nameDi2015NewLine    using(FileStream st = File.Create(name))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Position the file pointer at a position 4 byte less than the required sizeDi2015NewLine      UTF8Encoding utf8 = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLine      BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(st, utf8);Di2015NewLine      bw.Seek(pos, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Write the last 4 bytesDi2015NewLine      bw.Write(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13014667Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Combinations<T>(Di2015NewLine      this IEnumerable<T> source, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = 1;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var innerSequence in source.Skip(count).Combinations(n - 1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new T[] { item }.Concat(innerSequence);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13014667Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> AllCombinations<T>(this IList<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> output = Enumerable.Empty<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < source.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        output = output.Concat(source.Combinations(i));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13016043Di2015UniqueSeparator        string infile = @"C:\\temp\\in.dat";Di2015NewLine        string outfile = @"C:\\temp\\out.dat";Di2015NewLine        Regex re = new Regex(@"H[a-z]+ W[a-z]+");   // looking for "Hello World"Di2015NewLine        string repl =  @"Hi there";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Encoding ascii = Encoding.ASCII;Di2015NewLine        byte[] inbytes = File.ReadAllBytes(infile);Di2015NewLine        string instr = ascii.GetString(inbytes);Di2015NewLine        Match match = re.Match(instr);Di2015NewLine        int beg = 0;Di2015NewLine        bool replaced = false;Di2015NewLine        List<byte> newbytes = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine        while (match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            replaced = true;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = beg; i < match.Index; i++)Di2015NewLine                newbytes.Add(inbytes[i]);Di2015NewLine            foreach (char c in repl)Di2015NewLine                newbytes.Add(Convert.ToByte(c));Di2015NewLine            Match nmatch = match.NextMatch();Di2015NewLine            int end = (nmatch.Success) ? nmatch.Index : inbytes.Length;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = match.Index + match.Length; i < end; i++)Di2015NewLine                newbytes.Add(inbytes[i]);Di2015NewLine            beg = end;Di2015NewLine            match = nmatch;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (replaced)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newarr = newbytes.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            File.WriteAllBytes(outfile, newarr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            File.WriteAllBytes(outfile, inbytes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13021346Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Delegate CreateDelegate( Type delegateType, Action<object[]> target )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sourceParameters = delegateType.GetMethod("Invoke").GetParameters();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parameters = sourceParameters.Select( p => Expression.Parameter( p.ParameterType, p.Name ) ).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var castParameters = parameters.Select(p => Expression.TypeAs(p, typeof(object))).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var createArray = Expression.NewArrayInit(typeof(object), castParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var invokeTarget = Expression.Invoke(Expression.Constant(target), createArray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lambdaExpression = Expression.Lambda( delegateType, invokeTarget, parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lambdaExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

     return x.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object NullSafeGet(IDataReader rs, string[] names, object owner)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // 13026630Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Select an option by first searching for a case insensitive direct match then trying a case insenstive contains match.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="selectElement">The SelectElement to use.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="searchText">The text to find in the options.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void SelectByText(this SelectElement selectElement, string searchText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var allOptionsThatHaveText =Di2015NewLine        selectElement.Options.Where(se => se.Text.Equals(searchText, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (allOptionsThatHaveText.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var option in allOptionsThatHaveText)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            option.Click();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var optionWithText = selectElement.Options.Where(option => option.Text.IndexOf(searchText, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) >= 0);Di2015NewLine    if (optionWithText.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var option in optionWithText)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            option.Click();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new NoSuchElementException(string.Format("Cannot find the text: {0} by either a case insenstive match or a case insensitive equals match.", searchText));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13027138Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool RecognizePushGesture()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AutoResetEvent ar = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        List<Point3D> shoulderPoints = new List<Point3D>();Di2015NewLine        List<Point3D> handPoints = new List<Point3D>();Di2015NewLine        shoulderPoints.Add(Mouse.shoulderPoint);Di2015NewLine        handPoints.Add(Mouse.GetSmoothPoint());Di2015NewLine        Timer dt = new Timer(1000);Di2015NewLine        bool click = false;Di2015NewLine        dt.Elapsed += (o, s) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            shoulderPoints.Add(Mouse.shoulderPoint);Di2015NewLine            handPoints.Add(Mouse.GetSmoothPoint());Di2015NewLine            double i = shoulderPoints[0].Z - handPoints[0].Z;Di2015NewLine            double j = shoulderPoints[1].Z - handPoints[1].Z;Di2015NewLine            double k = j - i;Di2015NewLine            if (k >= 0.04)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                click = true;Di2015NewLine                dt.Stop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ar.Set();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        dt.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //should wait with returning the value until timer raises elapsed eventDi2015NewLine        ar.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        return click;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13027633Di2015UniqueSeparatorSemaphore
13027633Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Text {Di2015NewLine    public static Regex rx = new Regex(@" (PREVID|ACTID\\=([0-9]+)) ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Text prv; // previous articleDi2015NewLine    private string ot; // original textDi2015NewLine    private int id; // act id on textDi2015NewLine    private Semaphore isComputed = new Semaphore(0, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ActID {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            isComputed.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            int _id = id;Di2015NewLine            isComputed.Release();Di2015NewLine            return _id;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ProcessText() {Di2015NewLine        var mx = rx.Match(ot);Di2015NewLine        var prev = mx.Groups [1].Value == "PREVID";Di2015NewLine        if(prev)Di2015NewLine            id = prv == null ? 0 : prv.ActID;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            if(!int.TryParse(mx.Groups [2].Value, out id))Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception(string.Format(@"Incorrect article id ""{0}""", mx.Groups [0].Value));Di2015NewLine        isComputed.Release();Di2015NewLine        return !prev;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Text(string original_text, Text previous) {Di2015NewLine        prv = previous;Di2015NewLine        ot = original_text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main(String [] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // same random stream (for debugging)Di2015NewLine    var rnd = new Random(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var noise = @"These references are usually independent, but occasionally";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // some noise textDi2015NewLine    var bit = new Func<string>(() =>Di2015NewLine        noise.Substring(0, rnd.Next(noise.Length)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // random articleDi2015NewLine    var text = new Func<string>(() =>Di2015NewLine        string.Format(@"{0}{1}{2}", bit(),Di2015NewLine            rnd.Next() % 2 == 0 ? " PREVID "Di2015NewLine                                : string.Format(@" ACTID={0} ", rnd.Next()), bit()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // random data inputDi2015NewLine    var data = new List<Text>();Di2015NewLine    Text prv = null;Di2015NewLine    for(var n = 0; n < 1000000; n++)Di2015NewLine        // producer / consumer is better to parallelize load data stepDi2015NewLine        data.Add(prv = new Text(text(), prv));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.Write("Press key to start...");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // parallel processingDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0} unique ID's", data.AsParallel().Where(n => n.ProcessText()).Count());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Process completed.");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13027786Di2015UniqueSeparator^           - Match start of stringDi2015NewLine[1-9]       - Followed by one digit (1-9), no 0Di2015NewLine\\d*         - Followed by any number of digits (can contain digits from Di2015NewLine              other cultures). If you want to constain use [0-9] instead of \\dDi2015NewLine[a-zA-Z]?   - Followed by either one character or noneDi2015NewLine$           - Followed by end of stringDi2015NewLine

13035170Di2015UniqueSeparatordesription
13035170Di2015UniqueSeparator   <description>Di2015NewLine         <![CDATA[Di2015NewLine                <p>Results of a national survey of 18-35 year old Americans revealed that the next generation of homebuyers are more knowledgeable, responsible and savvy.</p> <p>The Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate survey showed that the housing market positively impacted Generation X and Y, which accounts for an estimated 103 million Americans. Seventy-seven percent of the Generation X and Y Americans who were surveyed reported that they have become increasingly knowledgeable about homeownership as a result of increased media coverage that has highlighted real estate topics over the past six years.</p> <p>"Every generation faces defining economic events that alter their collective perspective," said Sherry Chris, president and CEO of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate LLC. "'The Greatest Generation' was shaped by the Great Depression and Baby Boomers were impacted by the oil crises throughout the 1970s. Gen X and Gen Y experienced their 'coming of age' moment during the largest housing market downturn in American history."</p> <p>According to the survey, the two younger generations of potential homebuyers aren't discouraged from buying homes as a result of the financial turmoil the country has went through in the past several years. The two generations reported that they have become more knowledgeable about homeownership not being something they deserve, but it's something they must earn.</p> <p>The survey also showed that close to all of those surveyed were willing to adjust their lifestyles in order to save up for a home by eating out less, working a second job or even moving back home with their parents.</p> <p>The housing market is on the rise, despite President Obama's claims that congressional Republicans have held up legislation proposed to lower lending rates for millions of borrowers.</p>Di2015NewLine        ]]>Di2015NewLine    </description>Di2015NewLine

*ad;Di2015NewLineint16 adbuf[4096];Di2015NewLineint32 k, ts, rem;Di2015NewLinechar const *hyp;Di2015NewLinechar const *uttid;Di2015NewLinecont_ad_t *cont;Di2015NewLine//char NULL)Di2015NewLine    printf("Failed to initialize voice activity detection\\n");Di2015NewLineif (ad_start_rec(ad) < 0)Di2015NewLine    printf("Failed to start recording\\n");Di2015NewLineif (cont_ad_calib(cont) < 0)Di2015NewLine    printf("Failed to calibrate voice activity detection\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (;;) {Di2015NewLine    /* Indicate listening for next utterance */Di2015NewLine    //printf("READY....\\n");Di2015NewLine    fflush(stdout);Di2015NewLine    fflush(stderr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Wait data for next utterance */Di2015NewLine    while ((k = cont_ad_read(cont, adbuf, 4096)) == 0)Di2015NewLine        sleep_msec(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (k < 0)Di2015NewLine        printf("Failed to read audio\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * Non-zero amount of data received; start recognition of new utterance.Di2015NewLine     * NULL argument to uttproc_begin_utt => automatic generation of utterance-id.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    if (ps_start_utt(ps, NULL) < 0)Di2015NewLine        printf("Failed to start utterance\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ps_process_raw(ps, adbuf, k, FALSE, FALSE);Di2015NewLine    //printf("Listening...\\n");Di2015NewLine    fflush(stdout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Note timestamp for this first block of data */Di2015NewLine    ts = cont->read_ts;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Decode utterance until end (marked by a "long" silence, >1sec) */Di2015NewLine    for (;;) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Read non-silence audio data, if any, from continuous listening module */Di2015NewLine        if ((k = cont_ad_read(cont, adbuf, 4096)) < 0)Di2015NewLine            printf("Failed to read audio 2nd\\n");Di2015NewLine        if (k == 0) {Di2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine             * No speech data available; check current timestamp with most recentDi2015NewLine             * speech to see if more than 1 sec elapsed.  If so, end of utterance.Di2015NewLine             */Di2015NewLine            if ((cont->read_ts - ts) > DEFAULT_SAMPLES_PER_SEC)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            /* New speech data received; note current timestamp */Di2015NewLine            ts = cont->read_ts;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         * Decode whatever data was read above.Di2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        rem = ps_process_raw(ps, adbuf, k, FALSE, FALSE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* If no work to be done, sleep a bit */Di2015NewLine        if ((rem == 0) && (k == 0))Di2015NewLine            sleep_msec(20);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * Utterance ended; flush any accumulated, unprocessed A/D data and stopDi2015NewLine     * listening until current utterance completely decodedDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    ad_stop_rec(ad);Di2015NewLine    while (ad_read(ad, adbuf, 4096) >= 0);Di2015NewLine    cont_ad_reset(cont);Di2015NewLine    fflush(stdout);Di2015NewLine    /* Finish decoding, obtain and print result */Di2015NewLine    ps_end_utt(ps);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    hyp = ps_get_hyp(ps, NULL, &uttid);Di2015NewLine    fflush(stdout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Exit if the first word spoken was GOODBYE */Di2015NewLine    //actually, for unity, exit if any word was spoken at all! this will avoid an infinite loop of doom!Di2015NewLine    if (hyp) {Di2015NewLine        strcpy(fromUnity,hyp);Di2015NewLine        break;               Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        //return "nothing returned";Di2015NewLine    /* Resume A/D recording for next utterance */Di2015NewLine    if (ad_start_rec(ad) < 0)Di2015NewLine        printf("Failed to start recording\\n");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecont_ad_close(cont);Di2015NewLinead_close(ad);Di2015NewLineps_free(ps);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13044422Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Get the first child of type T in the visual tree.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>the first child of type T in the visual tree, or null if no such element exists</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static T GetChildOfType<T>(this DependencyObject source) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(source); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(source, i);Di2015NewLine        if (child != null && child.GetType() == typeof(T))Di2015NewLine            return child as T;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(source); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(source, i);Di2015NewLine        var t = child.GetChildOfType<T>();Di2015NewLine        if (t != null) return t;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13044715Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitConverter.IsLittleEndian
13044715Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static float ReadSingleBigEndian(byte[] data, int offset)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ReadSingle(data, offset, false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static float ReadSingleLittleEndian(byte[] data, int offset)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ReadSingle(data, offset, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static float ReadSingle(byte[] data, int offset, bool littleEndian)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian != littleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {   // other-endian; reverse this portion of the data (4 bytes)Di2015NewLine        byte tmp = data[offset];Di2015NewLine        data[offset] = data[offset + 3];Di2015NewLine        data[offset + 3] = tmp;Di2015NewLine        tmp = data[offset + 1];Di2015NewLine        data[offset + 1] = data[offset + 2];Di2015NewLine        data[offset + 2] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return BitConverter.ToSingle(data, offset);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13045363Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar same = Di2015NewLine   from r in db.RequestsDi2015NewLine   where r.firstName.ToLower() == request.firstName.ToLower()Di2015NewLine      && r.lastName.ToLower() == request.lastName.ToLower()Di2015NewLine   select r;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif(string.IsNullOrEmpty(request.street)) {Di2015NewLine    same = same.Where(r => string.IsNullOrEmpty(r.street));Di2015NewLine} else {Di2015NewLine    string street = request.street.ToLower();Di2015NewLine    same = same.Where(r => r.street.ToLower() == street);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13045363Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> FieldsAreEqualOrBothNullOrEmpty<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IQueryable<T> source,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, string>> member, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Expression body;Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(value))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine            typeof(string), "IsNullOrEmpty", null, member.Body);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine            Expression.Call(member.Body, "ToLower", null),Di2015NewLine            Expression.Constant(value.ToLower(), typeof(string)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source.Where(Expression.Lambda<Func<T,bool>>(Di2015NewLine        body, member.Parameters));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13049358Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T FindControlRecursive<T>(Control holder, string controlID) where T : ControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Control foundControl = null;Di2015NewLine  foreach (Control ctrl in holder.Controls)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (ctrl.GetType().Equals(typeof(T)) &&Di2015NewLine      (string.IsNullOrEmpty(controlID) || (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(controlID) && ctrl.ID.Equals(controlID))))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      foundControl = ctrl;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (ctrl.Controls.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      foundControl = FindControlRecursive<T>(ctrl, controlID);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (foundControl != null)Di2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return (T)foundControl;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        this.DataContext = vm;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _canScroll = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void TextBox_TextChanged(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBox textBox = sender as TextBox;Di2015NewLine        if (textBox == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ensure we can scrollDi2015NewLine        if (_canScroll)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // set the cursor to the end and scroll downDi2015NewLine            textBox.Select(textBox.Text.Length, 0);Di2015NewLine            textBox.ScrollToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // save these so the box doesn't jump around if the user goes back inDi2015NewLine            _selectionLength = textBox.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLine            _selectionStart = textBox.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (!_canScroll)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // move the cursor to where the mouse is if we're not selecting anything (for if we are selecting something the cursor has already moved to where it needs to be)Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(_selectedText))Di2015NewLine            //if (textBox.SelectionLength > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textBox.CaretIndex = textBox.GetCharacterIndexFromPoint(Mouse.GetPosition(textBox), true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textBox.Select(_selectionStart, _selectionLength); // restore what was savedDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void TextBox_MouseEnterLeave(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBox textBox = sender as TextBox;Di2015NewLine        if (textBox == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Don't scroll if the mouse is in the boxDi2015NewLine        if (e.RoutedEvent.Name == "MouseEnter")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _canScroll = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (e.RoutedEvent.Name == "MouseLeave")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _canScroll = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void TextBox_SelectionChanged(object sender, thingsDi2015NewLine        _selectionLength = textBox.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLine        _selectionStart = textBox.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine        _selectedText = textBox.SelectedText; // save the selected text because it gets destroyed on text update before the TexChanged event.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13060068Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing UnityEngine;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LowPassFilter : MonoBehaviour {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public float cutoff;Di2015NewLine    public float resonance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const float CUTOFF_MAX = 128.0f;Di2015NewLine    const float CUTOFF_MIN = 0.0f;Di2015NewLine    const float RESONANCE_MAX = 128.0f;Di2015NewLine    const float RESONANCE_MIN = 0.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float c;Di2015NewLine    float r;Di2015NewLine    float v0;Di2015NewLine    float v1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int sampleRate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cutoff = 20.0f;Di2015NewLine        resonance = 0.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        c = 0.0f;Di2015NewLine        r = 0.0f;Di2015NewLine        v0 = 0.0f;Di2015NewLine        v1 = 0.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sampleRate = AudioSettings.outputSampleRate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void OnAudioFilterRead(float[] data, int channels)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cutoff = Mathf.Clamp(cutoff, CUTOFF_MIN, CUTOFF_MAX);Di2015NewLine        resonance = Mathf.Clamp(resonance, RESONANCE_MIN, RESONANCE_MAX);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        c = Mathf.Pow(0.5f, (128.0f - cutoff) / 16.0f);Di2015NewLine        r = Mathf.Pow(0.5f, (resonance + 24.0f) / 16.0f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            v0 =  ((1.0f - r * c) * v0)  -  (c * v1)  + (c * data[i]);Di2015NewLine            v1 =  ((1.0f - r * c) * v1)  +  (c * v0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            data[i] = Mathf.Clamp(v1, -1.0f, 1.0f);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13063404Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class Retriever<T> : IRetriever<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object locker;Di2015NewLine    private readonly BlockingCollection<Uri> pending;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Thread[] threads;Di2015NewLine    private CancellationTokenSource cancellation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private volatile int isStarted;Di2015NewLine    private volatile int isDisposing;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<RetrieverEventArgs<T>> Retrieved;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected Retriever(int concurrency)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (concurrency <= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("concurrency", "The specified concurrency level must be greater than zero.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.locker = new object();Di2015NewLine        this.pending = new BlockingCollection<Uri>(new ConcurrentQueue<Uri>());Di2015NewLine        this.threads = new Thread[concurrency];Di2015NewLine        this.cancellation = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.isStarted = 0;Di2015NewLine        this.isDisposing = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.InitializeThreads();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ~Retriever()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Dispose(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InitializeThreads()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < this.threads.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread thread = new Thread(this.ProcessQueue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IsBackground = trueDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.threads[i] = thread;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void StartThreads()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Thread thread in this.threads)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (thread.ThreadState == ThreadState.Unstarted)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                thread.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CancelOperations(bool reset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.cancellation.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        this.cancellation.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (reset)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.cancellation = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WaitForThreadsToExit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Thread thread in this.threads)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            thread.Join();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessQueue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (this.isDisposing == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (this.isStarted == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(this.locker);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Uri location;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                location = this.pending.Take(this.cancellation.Token);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (OperationCanceledException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            T data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data = this.Retrieve(location, this.cancellation.Token);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (OperationCanceledException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RetrieverEventArgs<T> args = new RetrieverEventArgs<T>(location, data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            EventHandler<RetrieverEventArgs<T>> callback = this.Retrieved;Di2015NewLine            if (!Object.ReferenceEquals(callback, null))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                callback(this, args);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ThowIfDisposed()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.isDisposing == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ObjectDisposedException("Retriever");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract T Retrieve(Uri location, CancellationToken token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref this.isDisposing, 1, 0) == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.CancelOperations(false);Di2015NewLine            this.WaitForThreadsToExit();Di2015NewLine            this.pending.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ThowIfDisposed();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref this.isStarted, 1, 0) == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The retriever is already started.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Monitor.PulseAll(this.locker);Di2015NewLine        this.StartThreads();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(Uri location)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.pending.Add(location);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ThowIfDisposed();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref this.isStarted, 0, 1) == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The retriever is already stopped.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.CancelOperations(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13065137Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void PRegex()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader fin = new StreamReader("text.txt"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string tmp = fin.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var matches = Regex.Matches(tmp, "(CM_) ([^;]*);", RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < matches.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                if (matches[i].Groups.Count == 3)Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine((2 * i + 1).ToString() + ". " + matches[i].Groups[1].Value + "\\r\\n" + (2 * (i + 1)).ToString() + ". " + matches[i].Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void PLineByLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader fin = new StreamReader("text.txt"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLine            string line = null;Di2015NewLine            string currentCMBlock = null;Di2015NewLine            bool endOfBlock = true;Di2015NewLine            while ((line = fin.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool endOfLine = false;Di2015NewLine                while (!endOfLine)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (endOfBlock)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int startIndex = line.IndexOf("CM_ ");Di2015NewLine                        if (startIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            endOfLine = true;Di2015NewLine                            continue;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        line = line.Substring(startIndex + 4, line.Length - startIndex - 4);Di2015NewLine                        endOfBlock = false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!endOfBlock)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int startIndex = line.IndexOf(";");Di2015NewLine                        if (startIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            currentCMBlock += line + "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine                            endOfLine = true;Di2015NewLine                            continue;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        currentCMBlock += line.Substring(0, startIndex);Di2015NewLine                        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(currentCMBlock))Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine((++index) + ". CM_\\r\\n" + (++index) + ". " + currentCMBlock);Di2015NewLine                        currentCMBlock = null;Di2015NewLine                        line = line.Substring(startIndex + 1, line.Length - startIndex - 1);Di2015NewLine                        endOfBlock = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13068852Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void TestApplicationCurrentCultureInOtherThreads()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create the timer.Di2015NewLine    using (var t = new System.Timers.Timer(1000))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The task completion source.Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Captured name.Di2015NewLine        CultureInfo capturedCulture = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the current culture.Di2015NewLine        // The default for the system needs to be something otherDi2015NewLine        // than "en-GB", mine is "en-US", which is why thisDi2015NewLine        // test passes.Di2015NewLine        Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture = new CultureInfo("en-GB");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy t.Di2015NewLine        var tCopy = t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Event handler.Di2015NewLine        t.Elapsed += (s, e) => {Di2015NewLine            // Stop the timer.Di2015NewLine            tCopy.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // What's the captured name.Di2015NewLine            capturedCulture = CultureInfo.CurrentCulture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Complete the task.Di2015NewLine            tcs.SetResult(null);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start.Di2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wait.Di2015NewLine        tcs.Task.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compare.Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreNotEqual(Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture, Di2015NewLine            capturedCulture);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13072596Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void txtHoverWord_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!(sender is TextBox)) return;Di2015NewLine    var targetTextBox = sender as TextBox;Di2015NewLine    if(targetTextBox.TextLength < 1) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var currentTextIndex = targetTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition(e.Location);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var wordRegex = new Regex(@"(\\w+)");Di2015NewLine    var words = wordRegex.Matches(targetTextBox.Text);Di2015NewLine    if(words.Count < 1) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var currentWord = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    for (var i = words.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (words[i].Index <= currentTextIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentWord = words[i].Value;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(currentWord == string.Empty) return;Di2015NewLine    toolTip.SetToolTip(targetTextBox, currentWord);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13072614Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ReflectionExtensions {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object InvokeWithNamedParameters(this MethodBase self, object obj, IDictionary<string, object> namedParameters) { Di2015NewLine        return self.Invoke(obj, MapParameters(self, namedParameters));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object[] MapParameters(MethodBase method, IDictionary<string, object> namedParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] paramNames = method.GetParameters().Select(p => p.Name).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        object[] parameters = new object[paramNames.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; ++i) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parameters[i] = Type.Missing;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in namedParameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var paramName = item.Key;Di2015NewLine            var paramIndex = Array.IndexOf(paramNames, paramName);Di2015NewLine            parameters[paramIndex] = item.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return parameters;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
